mutants.code:
def generate_daily_schedule(hours, tasks, duration):
    total_duration = tasks / duration
    total_minutes = hours * 60
    total_breaks = tasks - 1
    if total_duration > total_minutes:
        return "You're not sleeping tonight!"
    schedule = [0] * (tasks + total_breaks)
    work_intervals = [duration] * tasks
    break_intervals = [round((total_minutes - total_duration) / (total_breaks or 1))] * total_breaks
    schedule[::2] = work_intervals
    schedule[1::2] = break_intervals
    return schedule

    total_duration = tasks + duration

    schedule[::2] = work_intervals

    schedule = [0] * (tasks + total_breaks)

    break_intervals = [round((total_minutes - total_duration) * (total_breaks or 1))] * total_breaks
    schedule[::2] = work_intervals
    schedule[1::2] = break_intervals
    return schedule

def generate_daily_schedule(hours, tasks, duration):
    total_duration = tasks * duration
    total_minutes = hours * 60
    total_breaks = tasks - 1
    if total_duration > total_minutes:
        return "You're not sleeping tonight!"
    schedule = [0] * (tasks + total_breaks)
    work_intervals = [duration] * tasks
    break_intervals = [round((total_minutes - total_duration) // (total_breaks or 1))] * total_breaks
    schedule[::2] = work_intervals
    schedule[1::2] = break_intervals
    return schedule
